hero.headline: Your Groundwork & Landscaping Experts
hero.subheadline: Professional, reliable, and fully insured — serving Milton Keynes and surrounding areas.

about.title: About Preekel
about.description: Preekel Construction Services are specialists in domestic and commercial groundwork and landscaping. We are fully insured, offer quality workmanship, and are proud to serve clients across Milton Keynes and the surrounding areas.

items.title: Paving & Block Paving
items.description: Driveways, patios, and custom paved surfaces.

items.title: Surfacing Works
items.description: Complete surfacing solutions for all property types.

items.title: Slabbing & Porcelain Tiling
items.description: Clean, modern finishes for outdoor spaces.

items.title: Site Preparation & Earthworks
items.description: Ground clearance, grading, and readiness work.

items.title: Foundations & Drainage
items.description: Foundation laying and drainage system installs.

items.title: Site Clearance & Remediation
items.description: Full removal and preparation for new works.

items.title: Domestic & Commercial Projects
items.description: No job too big or small — we cover all scopes.

items.title: Fully Insured
items.description: Your property is in safe, professional hands.

items.title: Experienced Team
items.description: Skilled professionals focused on quality workmanship.

quotes.name: Residential Client
quotes.quote: The new driveway looks brilliant — completed ahead of schedule and exactly how we wanted it.

quotes.name: Commercial Project Manager
quotes.quote: Excellent team. Professional communication and top-quality groundwork.

items.question: Do you offer free quotes?
items.answer: Yes — get in touch anytime and we’ll provide a no-obligation quote.

items.question: Are you fully insured?
items.answer: Yes — we’re fully insured and ready for both domestic and commercial work.

items.question: Do you work outside of Milton Keynes?
items.answer: Yes, we also cover surrounding areas.

contact.title: Call Us for a Free Quote
contact.description: Reach out today and we’ll arrange a visit or quote based on your needs.
